title: Login issues
body:
Basically, I try to login but cant, due to being "unable to connect to the login queue" I've tried all the troubleshoot options that are suggested, but to no avail

Any help?

replies.body: We're aware of a problem that is causing some players to have problems logging on to League. Can you please check out t[his post and follow the troubleshooting instructions](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006)? This will help us to get this resolved as quickly as possible.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7QVXYqUb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-13T01:26:11.316+0000)
>
> We're aware of a problem that is causing some players to have problems logging on to League. Can you please check out t[his post and follow the troubleshooting instructions](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006)? This will help us to get this resolved as quickly as possible.

Hey dude, tried doing these, no idea how to attach the output of the traceroutes to an email??

We've been able to identify the cause of the issue,  [and there's some details around it in that thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0034). 

Thanks a bunch for running through the troubleshooting steps - but thanks to a bunch of players we've been able to identify the cause of the problem and should be good for logs and traceroutes for now!

For future reference, you can take a screenshot of the traceroute via the snipping tool on windows - or you can copy and paste it through the menu bar in command prompt!
